div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: Please follow the link below for an official letter regarding COVID-19 and Lockwood R-1 Schools.
Lockwood Schools will begin serving meals for our students starting this Thursday, March 19. Please read the additional info if you would like to participate in this service.

ul.li: Meals can be picked up from 11:30 am - 1:00 pm, M-F starting 3/19.
We will be utilizing the high school circle drive to pick up meals. Just drive up to the door and someone will bring the meals to your car.
When you pick up a lunch meal, a breakfast meal will also be included for the following morning.
Any child 18 years or younger can receive this free meal regardless of economic status.

If you plan to use this service, we would appreciate it if you would call or email Cindy tomorrow (3/18) to let her know how many meals you need. Cindy can be reached at 417-232-4513 or ccornish@tigersk12.org.
Also, please stay tuned for more information on enrichment packets for our students.

div.p: Please read this letter from Mr. Lasater before reading any building letters. - https://5il.co/dwi8

Lockwood R-1 Schools
400 West 4th St.
Lockwood, MO 65682
